comment: * Note: The Holiday framework is a technology preview. * Despite its age, is still draft API, and clients should treat it as such. * * A Holiday subclass which represents holidays that occur * a fixed number of days before or after Easter. Supports both the * Western and Orthodox methods for calculating Easter. * @hide Only a subset of ICU is exposed in Android * @hide draft / provisional / internal are hidden on Android

variables.name: SHROVE_TUESDAY
variables.comment:
* Shrove Tuesday, aka Mardi Gras, 48 days before Easter
     * @hide draft / provisional / internal are hidden on Android

variables.name: ASH_WEDNESDAY
variables.comment:
* Ash Wednesday, start of Lent, 47 days before Easter
     * @hide draft / provisional / internal are hidden on Android

variables.name: PALM_SUNDAY
variables.comment:
* Palm Sunday, 7 days before Easter
     * @hide draft / provisional / internal are hidden on Android

variables.name: MAUNDY_THURSDAY
variables.comment:
* Maundy Thursday, 3 days before Easter
     * @hide draft / provisional / internal are hidden on Android

variables.name: GOOD_FRIDAY
variables.comment:
* Good Friday, 2 days before Easter
     * @hide draft / provisional / internal are hidden on Android

variables.name: EASTER_SUNDAY
variables.comment:
* Easter Sunday
     * @hide draft / provisional / internal are hidden on Android

variables.name: EASTER_MONDAY
variables.comment:
* Easter Monday, 1 day after Easter
     * @hide draft / provisional / internal are hidden on Android

variables.name: ASCENSION
variables.comment:
* Ascension, 39 days after Easter
     * @hide draft / provisional / internal are hidden on Android

variables.name: PENTECOST
variables.comment:
* Pentecost (aka Whit Sunday), 49 days after Easter
     * @hide draft / provisional / internal are hidden on Android

variables.name: WHIT_SUNDAY
variables.comment:
* Whit Sunday (aka Pentecost), 49 days after Easter
     * @hide draft / provisional / internal are hidden on Android

variables.name: WHIT_MONDAY
variables.comment:
* Whit Monday, 50 days after Easter
     * @hide draft / provisional / internal are hidden on Android

variables.name: CORPUS_CHRISTI
variables.comment:
* Corpus Christi, 60 days after Easter
     * @hide draft / provisional / internal are hidden on Android
